meanings.definition: The act of forming a friendly relationship with others, especially those in a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Fraternization among team members boosts morale and fosters unity.
meanings.sent2: At the company picnic, there was a lot of fraternization among colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The fraternization between the rival teams surprised everyone but led to a fun game.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, fraternization can sometimes blur professional boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The fraternization between the two clubs created a strong bond that lasted for years.

meanings.definition: The act of socializing or interacting in a friendly manner with others, often in a group setting.
meanings.sent1: Fraternization at the party made everyone feel welcome and included.
meanings.sent2: During the team-building exercise, there was a lot of fraternization among coworkers.
meanings.sent3: The fraternization at the neighborhood block party brought the community closer together.
meanings.sent4: In the school cafeteria, fraternization among students was encouraged to promote a positive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The fraternization between the different departments improved communication and collaboration.
